main event: A bright light was observed by three men in Eyrarbakki, Iceland on 16 February 1953.
interesting points: The light was low and traveling southeast., The observation lasted for about 30 minutes., The color of the light stayed steady but faded and brightened several times., Previous reports of flying saucers were often included in local newspapers after the incidents occurred., A full-time translator is now available to expedite reports of such incidents.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
